definition: see 國務院國有資產監督管理委員會|国务院国有资产监督管理委员会[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: To be responsible for CPC Party-mass work of the Commission and affiliated institutions in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 负责国资委机关和在京直属单位的党群工作。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaoli, Head of the Party Committee Steering Group of the district SASAC, attended and addressed the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 区国资委党委督导组组长江小丽出席会议并讲话。

sentences.english: To be fair to SASAC, it never really stood much of a chance.
sentences.chinese: 公平点说，国资委从未有多少真正的机会。

sentences.english: Assist Mayor in charge of specific work of State-owned Asset Committee.
sentences.chinese: 协助市长抓国资委具体工作。

sentences.english: "This is the most pressing situation faced SASAC since it was established five yeas ago", said Li.
sentences.chinese: 这是国资委成立五年来第一次面临如此紧迫的局面。

sentences.english: There was 196 CSE when the Commission was established in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 在国资委2003年成立时，央企数量达196家。

sentences.english: Secondly, researches the meaning of financial supervision which SASAC as the investor gives to the Solely State-owned Company.
sentences.chinese: 其次，探究了国资委对国有独资公司财务监督的内涵。

sentences.english: In some ways, SASAC aims to modernise its enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 国资委的职责之一是推动国有企业的现代化。

definition: centrally-managed state-owned enterprise (PRC), abbr. for 中央企業|中央企业[zhong1 yang1 qi3 ye4]
State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission SASAC
pinyin: Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 国有资产监督管理委员会

definition: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of State Council (SASAC)/abbr. to 國資委|国资委[Guo2 Zi1 Wei3]
pinyin: Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

definition: abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)
China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), abbr. for 中國保險監督管理委員會|中国保险监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
